content.html:
Hey Will,

does wpopenid+ work with wordpress 2.2?  i checked out revision 14550 and am using WP2.2, but it gives me this error when I tried to activate wpopenid:

OpenID Consumer could not be activated, something bad happened. Skipping table create. Check libraries.
Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 8388608 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 273165 bytes) in /Library/WebServer/Documents/projects/vidoop-website/wordpress/wp-includes/cache.php on line 48

Any ideas?  Thanks!

P.S.  it worked with WP2.1
